title: Taylor Swift demand overwhelms Ticketmaster, leaving fans waiting for hours
description: Ticketmaster blames "unprecedented" demand for glitches and delays that prevented many Taylor Swift fans from securing tickets to her upcoming "Eras" tour.

title: Amazon starts widespread layoffs in corporate ranks
Inside Al Mazrah, the new map for ‘Warzone 2.0’
description: Developers at Infinity Ward and Raven discuss the ins and outs of the new "Warzone 2.0" map.

title: ‘Somerville’ is a gorgeous twist on alien invasion stories
description: 'Somerville' is a beautiful sci-fi adventure game from one of the minds behind 'Inside' and 'Limbo.'

title: iPhone 14s now can send SOS via satellite. Use it carefully.
description: Apple's new Emergency SOS via satellite feature lets anyone with an iPhone 14 call for help when lost or hurt away from cell reception.

title: Take control of your technology with The Tech Friend newsletter
description: The Tech Friend newsletter will bring you straight talk and advice to help make technology better serve you and our world, from Shira Ovide.

title: Google reaches record $392M privacy settlement over location data
description: Google settled with 40 states in the largest such deal in U.S. history, according to a group of state attorneys general.
